nodes.text: Yustapir Kyramud—"River Assassin" in Mando'a—was the name given to an enormous jurgoran that Shae Vizla's Mandalorians kept on Tracyn Island on the planet Rishi. The creature was one of a number of challenges that were kept in the Mandalorians' compound to test themselves against.

Yustapir Kyramud first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The jurgoran is one of three bosses—along with the tonitran Hodayc Sur'haai and the krak'jya Dralne be te Oya'karir—that appear in one iteration of the "Blood Hunt" Tactical Flashpoint; a second version of the Flashpoint features the k'lor'slug Adeen Edeemir, the lurker Pirun Ut, and the rancor Cerar Be Kyr'am. As the challenges can change, this article refrains from specifying which challenges were faced by the canon characters.
